column4: hello ... I'm trying to install WoW ... I mounted each .iso to a different folder ... for example /1 /2 /3 and /4 .. I run install in /1 and when it says please insert disc 2 I can't do anything ... i click ok and nothing happens ...  any ideas?
use the same directory
just mount over the iso
is if you start in /1 mount the 2nd cd to /1 when it asks for the 2nd cd
you mean ... mount all the discs in the same directory ...?
yes. but not all at once.
mount them ask the installer asks for them
yeah I tried that ... but when I clicked ok .. nothing happened
I'm using some program to mount them..
!iso | merzbow
try to do it that^^ way
I tried ... the thing is .. it wouldn't let me .. because of the filename  I think .. it was too long .. "World of Warcraft (Disc 1).iso"
its the spaces in the name
use tab auto complete
like mount .... /full/path/to/fi<tab>
and tab will auto fill it in....
yeap I know ... though there are 4 files named very similar .. the only difference is the disc number ...
hmm not sure then...
although I didn't put the full path
I went to the directory where the file is .. then I wrote the filename..
....its worth a shot.
